ReportText: CLINICAL DATA: Cough, chest congestion, and shortness of breath for the past 4 days. History of COPD, current smoker. EXAM: CHEST 2 VIEW COMPARISON: PA and lateral chest x-ray of [DATE] FINDINGS: The lungs are adequately inflated. There is no focal infiltrate. There is no pleural effusion. The heart and pulmonary vascularity are normal. The mediastinum is normal in width. There is no pleural effusion. The bony thorax exhibits no acute abnormality. IMPRESSION: There is no pneumonia nor other acute cardiopulmonary abnormality. Electronically Signed By: [[PERSONALNAME]] [[PERSONALNAME] Electronically Signed By: [[PERSONALNAME] On: 05/31/2018 16:56
